section.19: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Iyas bin Abi Ramlah said:"I heard Mu'awiyah asking Zaid bin Arqam: 'Did you attend two 'Eids with the Messenger of Allah (ï·º)?' He said: 'Yes; he prayed 'Eid at the beginning of the day then he granted a concession with regard to jumu'ah
